bibl.title: The Bilingual Archive of the Linen Weaver Petechonsis son of Thoteus and O. Bodl. Eg. Inscr. 328.
bibl.note: Edition of O. Bodl. Inv. Eg. Inscr. 328 (Demotic letter-receipt, perhaps following an apprenticeship agreement, Thebes, Nov. 17, 13 B.C.). - Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.seg: Andreas Winkler, The Bilingual Archive of the Linen Weaver Petechonsis son of Thoteus and O. Bodl. Eg. Inscr. 328.
